name: Warglaive
summary: Warglaive is a set of small to medium sized maps focusing on action-packed, difficult, classic-styled gameplay. Difficulty starts off moderate and escalates to very challenging on the later maps, though lowering skill level can ease things up significantly if needed. There are 7 main levels and one bonus level accessed through a secret exit on map 7, which is intended to be a very difficult challenge for seasoned players.
